front.title: Extensions to RSVP to Handle Establishment of Alternate Label-Switched Paths for Fast Re-route

abstract.t: This document describes the extensions that enables RSVP tosupport creation of an alternative label switched path to handlefast data packet reroute upon failure in a primary label switchedpath in an Multi-protocol Label Switching (MPLS) network asdescribed in [3]. As such, this draft is a companion draft to [3].The proposed extensions present no backward compatibility issues.
